publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3429 Mr Mike Rumbles on behalf of the Standards Committee: Replacing the Members' Interest Order: Proposal for a Committee Bill-That the Parliament agrees to the proposal for a Committee Bill under Rule 9.15 contained in the Standards Committee's 7th Report 2002, Replacing the Members' Interests Order: Proposal for a Committee Bill, (SP Paper 621).

S1M-3429 Mr Mike Rumbles on behalf of the Standards Committee: Replacing the Members' Interest Order: Proposal for a Committee Bill—That the Parliament agrees to the proposal for a Committee Bill under Rule 9.15 contained in the Standards Committee’s 7th Report 2002, Replacing the Members’ Interests Order: Proposal for a Committee Bill, (SP Paper 621).
